title: RANKED CHAMP SELECT BUG
body: whenever changing summoner spells make sure you only do it when it is your pick or afterwards, twice i have done this beforehand and after this the game has not allowed me to select a champion, forcibly ejecting me from the queue{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

We've had some reports of an issue with champion select and summoner spells after the 6.1 patch - and we're trying to find a fix. If you can provide some more information, it'll help us track down a solution

What is the Operating System that you're currently using when you get the error? (Windows 7/8/10, OSX, etc.)

Can you send in your client logs to ocelivereports@riotgames.com ?  [If you're not sure what logs they are, this link should let you know where to find them!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq8)

I've been having that problem every 2nd game and most recently i had the bug when pressing accept to join a match.

I am using windows 8.1 and playing off a usb
I am having the same problem on EUW.
